name: Saving Clicklandia
description:
HISTORY:


An ancient evil has awoken in the Kingdom of Clicklandia and chaos now reigns. The Legendary Dragon has attacked, unleashing terror and disorder upon the once-tranquil realm. The fate of the kingdom and its people hangs in the balance, and only a true hero can stand against the impending disaster.



Do you have what it takes to step into the shoes of this valiant hero? Embark on an epic journey to restore peace and order in Clicklandia. Navigate through treacherous landscapes, confront formidable foes, and unlock your true potential.



As you progress, you'll uncover many abilities, develop beneficial relationships with shopkeepers and witches alike and earn plenty of gold to help you on your journey.



Venture forth, for the Kingdom of Clicklandia relies on your courage and heroism. Will you rise to the challenge and save this world from its darkest hour? Find out and embark on a legendary adventure with Saving Clicklandia today!

Game Features:


Saving Clicklandia is a game in the genre of "match-three" in which you will have to pass numerous tests and fight with formidable bosses. This game is a classic "match-three" with role-playing elements, you can change the appearance of the character, equip the hero in different armor and craft numerous items that will help in battle and give an advantage.



The game features are battles with unique bosses that diversify the gameplay and change the approach to passing.

In addition to battles you can buy useful ingredients to create potions and other auxiliary items.

As you progress through the game, the levels will appear new game elements that develop the gameplay and complicate the passage.



Complete 200 levels
Catchy downloadable Original Soundtrack
Beautiful desktop wallpapers
Earn dozens of achievements
Defeat the formidable bosses
Find new equipment for the character
